articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S22 European price leak suggests a base Ultra model with less RAM - The Verge
articles.description: European pricing information for Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy S22 lineup has been leaked. Although it appears Samsung carried over its pricing for its S21 lineup, it may be offering an equally-priced S22 Ultra with less RAM.
